          <language>sv</language>
          <title>
            <string language="sv">Företagets funktioner</string>
            <string language="en">Carried out functions</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Durchgeführte Funktionen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Fonctions effectuées</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Funções realizadas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Funzioni effettuate</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πραγματοποιημένες λειτουργίες</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Funciones realizadas</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="sv">Alla företag måste innehålla fem funktioner. Dessa är försäljning, inköp, produktion, ekonomi samt ledning.Modul 4 - Administration och Regler.Ingår i FöretagarSKOLAN.</string>
            <string language="en">All companies must contain five functions. These are sale, purchases, production, economy and management.

Module 4 - administration and rules.

Is included in FöretagarSKOLAN.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sv">ekonomi</string>
            <string language="sv">försäljning</string>
            <string language="sv">inköp</string>
            <string language="sv">ledning</string>
            <string language="sv">samordning</string>
            <string language="sv">personal</string>
            <string language="sv">produktion</string>
            <string language="sv">funktion</string>
            <string language="sv">åtgärd</string>
            <string language="en">economy</string>
            <string language="en">sale</string>
            <string language="en">purchases</string>
            <string language="en">management</string>
            <string language="en">coordination</string>
            <string language="en">personnel</string>
            <string language="en">production</string>
            <string language="en">function</string>
            <string language="en">measure</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Alle Firmen müssen fünf Funktionen enthalten. 
Diese sind Verkauf, Erwerbe, Produktion, Wirtschaft und 
management.Module 4 - die Leitung und rules.Is, die in 
FöretagarSKOLAN eingeschlossen sind.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Toutes les compagnies doivent contenir cinq 
fonctions. Ce sont la vente, les achats, la production, 
l'économie et les management.Module 4 - gestion et rules.Is inclus 
dans FöretagarSKOLAN.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Todas as companhias devem conter cinco funções.
Estes são a venda, as compras, a produção, a economia e os 
management.Module 4 - administração e rules.Is incluídos em 
FöretagarSKOLAN.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Tutte le aziende devono contenere cinque 
funzioni. Questi sono vendita, acquisti, produzione, economia e 
management.Module 4 - gestione e rules.Is inclusi in FöretagarSKOLAN.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Όλες οι επιχειρήσεις πρέπει να περιέχουν πέντε 
λειτουργίες. Αυτοί είναι πώληση, αγορές, παραγωγή, 
ενότητα 4 οικονομίας και διαχείρισης - η διοίκηση και οι κανόνες 
συμπεριλαμβάνονται σε FφretagarSKOLAN.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Todas las compañías deben contener cinco 
funciones. Éstos son la venta, las compras, la producción, la 
economía y management.Module 4 - administración y rules.Is incluidos
en FöretagarSKOLAN.</string>
          </description>
